channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HADOOP-17164] UGI loginUserFromKeytab doesn't set the last login time
item.description: UGI initial login from keytab doesn't set the last login time as a result of which the relogin can happen even before the configured minimum seconds to wait before relogin
item.summary: UGI loginUserFromKeytab doesn't set the last login time

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
